thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 20 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Industrial & Infrastructure Fund Investment signs term loan contract worth 10 bln yen

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Industrial & Infrastructure Fund Investment signs term loan contract worth 10 bln yen

organizations.name: reuters) - industrial & infrastructure fund investment corp

text:
Feb 20 (Reuters) - Industrial & Infrastructure Fund Investment Corp
* Says it signs a term loan contract worth 10 billion yen, with a term of 7 years, on Feb. 20
* Contract period from March 16, 2018 to March 15, 2022
* The proceeds will be used for properties acquisition, loan repayment and working capital
Source text in Japanese: goo.gl/EHnVZk
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
